name: Drink Em Up Drinking Game
description:
Don’t have another boring night of pregaming, have some fun on us!

Drink Em Up is the best drinking game in the world. It’s as simple as that. Just click spin; then either drink, set a rule, or pass. If you break a rule, you'll face a forfeit to determine your fate. It couldn’t be easier and will keep your whole crew entertained, just what you need while getting your drink on!

FEATURES:
* Quick and easy to play
* Includes 20 awesome drinking rules
* Forfeits for rule breakers
* Bar style theme - you can almost smell the spilled drinks!
* Rule keeper tracks what rules are in-play so your drunk brain doesn't need to
* A secret coaster for those who survive and finish the game
* Over 85 hilarious drinking rules and challenges (with additional packs)

ADDITIONAL PACKS:
* 80s Movies - Get to the Choppa
* 90s Movies - Oversized clothes and shoulder pads
* The Devil's Forfeits - A collection of the most inappropriate, deprived and worst forfeits (you have been warned!)
* The Boy Who Lived - A collection of funny rules and forfeits inspired by everyone's favourite boy wizard

So get Drink Em Up now and start playing...

DISCLAIMER (because we have to):
This game is for 21 and up only! If you're underage, don't worry, the game is still fun with non-alcoholic drinks (we're guessing, we haven't tried it).

Firestorm Apps are not responsible or liable for anything that happens while playing or as a result of playing Drink Em Up. Don’t be a drunk fool, no-one likes that person....oh and don't do anything illegal!
